thread.title: Coziness in Mid-Manhatten
thread.title_full: Coziness in Mid-Manhatten - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Caratime2
title: Coziness in Mid-Manhatten
text:
I spent two weeks at the Roger Smith in February during a business trip, and thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The staff was always professional, friendly and helpful. They were patient that snafus in my booking would be sorted by my host organization, which greatly decreased my stress level.
My room was large and tidy. The furniture has seen better days - both where style and condition are concerned - but that just added to the overall charm. It certainly was more distinctive than the generic/impersonal furniture you most often find in rooms at larger hotel chains.
The location is wonderful, with proximity to Grand Central Terminal as well as numerous shops, restaurants, etc. (incl. a few open 24 hrs.)
Room Tip: Corner room was spacious and sunny See more room tips
